title: Vaya Futuro and Ben Allen at Greenhouse Studios - Converse Rubber Tracks
description:
Tijuana’s Vaya Futuro take an atmospheric approach to their expansive shoegaze, crafting yearning anthems perfect for soundtracking widescreen landscapes. For their Converse Rubber Tracks session, they headed to the one of the world's most striking environments to record in the top-level rooms at Iceland’s Greenhouse Studios. While in the studio, their session was joined by an unexpected collaborator - veteran producer Ben Allen came through to add his expertise to the band's new material. 

Listen to a new track from Vaya Futuro’s sessions at Greenhouse, “Congelar”

See more stories from the Converse Rubber Tracks global studio takeover
